snippet.title: Galactic Glitch: Prologue - Physics-based Action-Roguelike - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Play it for FREE on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/640160/Galactic_Glitch/

Galactic Glitch is an action-roguelike game with physics-based combat mechanics. Fight in bubbles of glitched Spacetime, hurl asteroids, bounce foes off of walls and destroy your enemies piece-by-piece on your path to total galactic domination.

Signup for Beta: https://www.galacticglitch.space/
Wishlist full game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1536620/Galactic_Glitch_Infinitys_Edge/
Get Updates on Discord: https://discord.gg/6jPYbpZa2g
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrunchyLeafGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CrunchyLeafGames
